com.github.dm.jrt.android.core

Class ServiceContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dm.jrt.android.core.ServiceContext

  • public abstract class ServiceContext
extends Object
    Class representing an Android Service context.

    No strong reference to the wrapped contexts will be retained by this class implementations.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 07/11/2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Context getServiceContext()
      Returns the Service context.
      abstract Intent getServiceIntent()
      Returns the Service Intent.
      static ServiceContext serviceFrom(Context context)
      Returns a Context based on the specified instance.
      static ServiceContext serviceFrom(Context context, Class<? extends InvocationService> serviceClass)
      Returns a Context based on the specified instance, employing a Service of the specified type.
      static ServiceContext serviceFrom(Context context, Intent service)
      Returns a Context based on the specified instance, employing the specified Intent to start the Service.

    • Method Detail

      • serviceFrom

        @NotNull
public static ServiceContext serviceFrom(@NotNull
                                                  Context context)
        Returns a Context based on the specified instance.
        The default InvocationService class will be employed.
        Parameters:
        context - the Context.
        Returns:
        the Service context.

public static ServiceContext serviceFrom(@NotNull
                                                  Context context,

      • serviceFrom

        @NotNull
public static ServiceContext serviceFrom(@NotNull
                                                  Context context,
                                                  @NotNull
                                                  Intent service)
        Returns a Context based on the specified instance, employing the specified Intent to start the Service.
        Parameters:
        context - the Context.
        service - the Service Intent.
        Returns:
        the Service context.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the component of the specified Intent does not inherit from InvocationService.
